card.name: Ancient Grudge
card.text: Destroy target artifact. Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Dromoka's Command
card.text: Choose two — • Prevent all damage target instant or sorcery spell would deal this turn. • Target player sacrifices an enchantment. • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. • Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control.

card.name: Ichor Wellspring
card.text: When Ichor Wellspring enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Intangible Virtue
card.text: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.

card.name: Ojutai's Command
card.text: Choose two — • Return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. • You gain 4 life. • Counter target creature spell. • Draw a card.

card.name: Ray of Revelation
card.text: Destroy target enchantment. Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Reverse Engineer
card.text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Draw three cards.

card.name: Silumgar's Command
card.text: Choose two — • Counter target noncreature spell. • Return target permanent to its owner's hand. • Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. • Destroy target planeswalker.

card.name: Stifle
card.text: Counter target activated or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

card.name: Trash for Treasure
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact. Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Urabrask the Hidden
card.text: Creatures you control have haste. Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Vault Skirge
card.text: ({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.) Flying Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

card.name: Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger
card.text: Trample Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced. Whenever an opponent taps a land for mana, that land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Whirler Rogue
card.text: When Whirler Rogue enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying. Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
